Question 03) In this life sitting on a park bench Thinking About a friend of mine he was only Twenty-Three Gone Before He Had His Time. It came without Warning Didnꞌt Want His Friends to See Him Cry He Knew the Day Was Dawning and I Didnꞌt Have a Chance To Say Goodbye.
Madonna. Erotic. United States: Maverick, 1992.
The song is often a way to manifest feelings and emotions of everyday life. For example, the suffering portrayed in this song was caused
A) For the early death of a young friend.
B) by the end of a love relationship.
C) by moving from a friend to another country.
D) for the end of a friendship of more than twenty years.
E) Betrayal by the nearby person.
